column1: WINDOW VAN (JUST INCASE WATERFED CAN BE USED)
BOEM ASSESS TIMING TO BE AT JOB FOR 8
column2: BRING LEVEL 1 AND 2 HARD WATER REMOVER.
MANY WINDOWS NEED TO BE REDONE. CHECK IF IT IS WATERFED ISSUES OR HARD WATER, PICS SENT FROM CLIENT LOOK LIKE A MIX OF BOTH. refer to email forwarded to Rohan.
client says no need for chemical but bring anyways and explain to her and show her the hard water issue frist thing before starting because she has to leave for an apointment.

There was hard water on some glass, but majority of the glass that she wanted redone did not come out good with the waterfed, so not a hard water problem. She is aware now though of the windows she has that have hard water and she said she might deal with it in the spring but for now she doesn't care, she's satisfied.
